name: The FNF Collection (Remaster)
description:
Welcome to The FNF Collection Remaster!

This game is a remastered version of The FNF Collection. 

With better menus and better animations.

Song Menu Controls:

W and S: Choose a Song 

Space: Select Song

Song Controls:

Left Opponent - WASD

Right Opponent - Arrows Keys

Thanks for reading and enjoy the game!
